titleStmt.title: An elegy upon his honoured friend Mr. James Herewyn, unfortunately slain by a fall from his horse
titleStmt.author: Godschalck, James.

titleStmt.title: An elegy upon his honoured friend Mr. James Herewyn, unfortunately slain by a fall from his horse
titleStmt.author: Godschalck, James.
Godschalck, James. Acrostich upon Mr. James Herewyn, merchant.
Sweeting, John, fl. 1650. Upon the unfortunate death of Mr. James Herrewyn merchant, by a fall from a horse.
Godschalck, James. We need no supr, or mettl'd horse.
Sweeting, John, fl. 1650. To Mr. Herrewyns friends.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Includes five elegiac poems inside border signed by James Godschalck and John Sweeting.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.

An elegy upon his honoured friend Mr. James Herrewyn unfortunately slain by a fall from his horse / James Godschalck -- An acrostich upon Mr. James Herewyn, merchant / James Godschalck -- Upon the unfortunate death of Mr. James Herrewyn merchant, by a fall from a horse / John Sweeting -- We need no supr,or mettl'd horse / I. G. -- To Mr. Herrewyns friends / I. S.
